# wy-attachments-list

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Type         | Default |
|----------|-----------|--------------|---------|
| `files`  |           | `FileType[]` | []      |
| `limit`  | `limit`   | `number`     | 3       |

## Methods

| Method             | Type                                  |
|--------------------|---------------------------------------|
| `createRenderRoot` | `(): this`                            |
| `dispatchFileOpen` | `(e: Event, file: FileType): boolean` |

## Events

| Event       | Type                               |
|-------------|------------------------------------|
| `file-open` | `CustomEvent<{ file: FileType; }>` |
